existing_features.title: Update the centralized frontend contact configuration to match the provided business details: address "Ricco Industrial Area Sujangarh Rajasthan:- 331507", phone numbers "+91 7734920728" and "+91 7297963005", email "ccsolutions0055@gmail.com", WhatsApp number "+91 7734920728" (wa.me link should use 917734920728), and business hours "Mon - Sat: 08:00 AM - 06:00 PM".
Update the UI to display both phone numbers and the business hours in the contact-related areas (TopBar, Contact section, and Footer) using English labels and consistent formatting.
Ensure the social media links are set to the provided Facebook/Instagram/YouTube URLs and are visible to users somewhere appropriate (e.g., Footer social icons/links) with accessible aria-labels.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add business contact details section (address, phone numbers, email, WhatsApp number), social media links (Facebook/Instagram/YouTube), and business hours (Mon–Sat 08:00 AM–06:00 PM)
Update the backend `getContactDetails()` data to match the provided business details for address, phone numbers, WhatsApp number, email, and business hours.
